#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType HoleStatistics.

== Name ==

*[CHoleStatistics HoleStatistics]*

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--HoleStatistics (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
			Type used to record basic hole statistics such as fairway hits and greens in regulation.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===

	<...>  (fairway, green-in-regulation, [CLengthWithUnits driving-distance], [CLengthWithUnits approach-to-hole]  )</...>

----
    

=== Nested Element Summary ===
        
|| [CLengthWithUnits golfml:LengthWithUnits] || [CLengthWithUnits approach-to-hole] ||  Distance left to hole when ball landed on green ||
|| [CLengthWithUnits golfml:LengthWithUnits] || [CLengthWithUnits driving-distance] ||  					Driving distance.				 ||
|| xs:boolean || fairway ||  					Fairway hit.				 ||
|| xs:boolean || green-in-regulation ||  					Green reached in regulation.				 ||

===  Local Usage ===

    	[CHoleScore HoleScore]
----
    <xs:complexType name="HoleStatistics">  <xs:sequence>    <xs:element name="fairway" type="xs:boolean">    </xs:element>    <xs:element name="green-in-regulation" type="xs:boolean">    </xs:element>    <xs:element name="driving-distance" type="golfml:LengthWithUnits">    </xs:element>    <xs:element name="approach-to-hole" type="golfml:LengthWithUnits">    </xs:element>  </xs:sequence></xs:complexType>
----
